tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE film_crew
(
    crew_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crew_name VARCHAR(255),
    position VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE films
(
    film_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    film_title VARCHAR(255),
    release_date DATE,
    duration INT,
    genre VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE film_crew_roles
(
    crew_id INT,
    role_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (crew_id) REFERENCES film_crew(crew_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES crew_roles(role_id)
);

CREATE TABLE film_directors (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  director_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  nationality VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  director_rating FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE film_producers (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  producer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  contact_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE)

CREATE TABLE film_writers (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  writer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  nationality VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  writer_rating FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE film_cast (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  actor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  character_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10))

CREATE TABLE film_crew (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crew_member_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  position VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  years_experience INT,
  salary DECIMAL(10,2))
